snippet: General manager Glen Sather, content to stay in the background, has turned the Rangers into a first-place team with strong drafts and player development.
abstract: New York Rangers general manager Glen Sather, content to stay in the background, has turned Rangers into a first-place team with strong drafts and player development.
lead_paragraph: General manager Glen Sather, content to stay in the background, has turned the Rangers into a first-place team with strong drafts and player development.

headline.seo: Glen Sather’s Rangers Win With Home-Grown Approach
headline.main: First-Place Rangers Are Wonders of Nurture
headline.print_headline: First-Place Rangers Are Wonders of Nurture
